thread.section_title: Nelson Alexander Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Nelson Alexander | www.nelsonalexander.com.au
thread.title: Scott

author: Scott
title: Scott
text:
I sold my property in Melbourne while I was in Perth. I thought I'd have to go to Melbourne once or twice to oversee the sale, but I didn't need to - Joe Russo didn't just help, he did EVERYTHING, from preparing the property for sale (including organising tradies), looking after the tenants, doing almost all of the paperwork (except for signing!), providing good advice, and managing all the behind-the-scenes issues.
Joe communicated regularly, managed my expectations, and over-delivered.
I was apprehensive about engaging a real estate agent - I needn't have been.
Thanks Joe
